text: Ben Gurion International Airport (, ) is an international airport in Tel Aviv, Israel. This airport is the main international airport in Israel and the largest airport in Israel. The airport is named after the first Israeli prime minister David Ben-Gurion. == References == == Other websites == *Ben Gurion International Airport, iaa.gov.il *Israeli Aviation Charts for flight simulation (including Ben Gurion) , vatil.or Category:Airports in Israel Category:Buildings and structures in Tel Aviv
title: Ben Gurion International Airport
